entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 4 April 2023
